description: Integrate Solvr into resurrection flow for knowledge compounding
steps: On death detection: POST to Solvr as 'problem' with death context (crash reason, last checkpoint CID)
Before resurrection: GET from Solvr - search for similar death patterns, known fixes
If Solvr has relevant solutions: apply them during resurrection config
On successful resurrection: POST 'approach' with status=succeeded and method used
On failed resurrection: POST 'approach' with status=failed and error details
Store Solvr problem ID in checkpoint metadata for continuity tracking
Verify: Death creates Solvr problem post
Verify: Resurrection searches Solvr for prior art
Verify: Success/failure updates Solvr approach status
Verify: Knowledge compounds - second death of same type finds first death's solution
